title: An Act permitting the city of Revere to establish penalties and liens for rooming house & certificates of fitness ordinance violations

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Giannino of Revere, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4752) of Jessica Ann Giannino (with the approval of the mayor and city council) that the city of Revere be authorized to establish penalties and liens for rooming house and certificates of fitness ordinance violations.  Municipalities and Regional Government.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/26/2025 from 10:00 AM-05:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
